data.description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974468_332017743231769_3438180485989163490_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=iqwadPIsYSEQ7kNvgH6mKAL&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBmxt1Sf_Jrt8SRPJ-W5z_kw_XiDc5eUWVvr7zGcrdB4w&oe=66AE12B7)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75507168_1446865232891556_3763410573840822716_n.png?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=TNxv9oB5eI8Q7kNvgEL--jk&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAg5FbsVelkLQBui-5nRHx-IHyRKa8ZV8Q88kQzyHBYEg&oe=66AE2052)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39003262_985625342809911_4235982824831484550_n.png?_nc_cat=105&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=DxKB1YZytNUQ7kNvgG5QFOV&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDOrpEWfh6wcFkg8q0IBu65Z4P3OBCGousQmoG5G5oQnA&oe=66AE0B89)
